org.ff4j.strategy

Class DarkLaunchStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ff4j.strategy.AbstractFlipStrategy
      • org.ff4j.strategy.PonderationStrategy
        • org.ff4j.strategy.DarkLaunchStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, FlippingStrategy

    public class DarkLaunchStrategy
extends PonderationStrategy
    The Dark Launch devops pattern is the capacity for a system to enable a new feature for a subset of incoming requests and measure if the new feature introduce some overhead. Without feature toggle you must deploy your new package on a node of the cluster and measure. With this strategy all nodes of the cluster have the new version a execute new behaviour for a subset of requests. This measure are more realistic and the behaviour should be validated without redeployment.
    Author:
    Cedrick Lunven (@clunven)
    See Also:
